name: Staika
description: The Staika token is the governance token of the Staika project and the ticker is marked as STIK. STIK can be obtained by purchasing from a designated exchange or by swapping from a DEX(decentralized exchange) or Staika Wallet. The use cases of the Staika are as follows: - Means to receive benefits and rewards within the Staika platform - Payment methods avaiable within the various services provided by the Staika platform - Exchange (swap) means for other altcoins - Payment and exchange methods(swap) for Staika-based Altcoin
